title: A new type of pyranthrene-based copolymer as a promising hole-transport material for perovskite solar cells
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,4638-4645
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00481G, Paper
Azat F. Akbulatov, Ekaterina A. Khakina, Nikita A. Emelianov, Olga A. Kraevaya, Lyubov A. Frolova, Pavel A. Troshin
The designed copolymer PATTBTT delivered a power conversion efficiency of 17.6% in PSCs, which was higher than those obtained for reference devices fabricated using conventional polytriarylamine-based hole-transport materials.
